channel.title: Delta Random Logout and RollBack? [PAYING FOR FIX]
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm having a problem, players are getting disconnected (like logged out) and their character file rolls back, randomly...
I have an auto save on an event every 5 minutes. It saves when you logout.
I just cant figure out what the problem is, players will randomly log out and it will roll back to a random state....
Like I dropped an item, got logged and it stayed away. Got logged out, came back on and it was back a few hours later?!
This problem started happening recently, if anyone can help me fix I will pay, need help immediately!
We can talk on msn!

item.title: Delta Random Logout and RollBack? [PAYING FOR FIX]
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

go into client.java, server.java and search for disconnect(true);, under that put save(true); so whenever you disconnect it saves.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta Random Logout and RollBack? [PAYING FOR FIX]
